sources.name: Correlates of War: National Material Capabilities (v4.0)
sources.description:
Correlates of War: National Material Capabilities (v4.0)
Data provider Correlates of War
Source Correlates of War
Description Iron and steel production, military expenditure, military personnel
Linkhttp://cow.dss.ucdavis.edu/data-sets/national-material-capabilities
Retrieved09/09/2015

Additional information

The variable 'milex' has been split into two variables as the currency of expenditure changes pre and post-1914. Pre-1914, military expenditure is in thousands of UK pounds and post-1914 it is in thousands of US dollars. Both expenditure figures are measured in current prices.

sources.name: Correlates of War: National Material Capabilities (v4.0) + Measuring Worth
sources.description:
Measuring Worth
Data providerQuandl
SourceMeasuring Worth
DescriptionGDP deflator data for UK and US
Linkhttp://cow.dss.ucdavis.edu/data-sets/national-material-capabilities
Retrieved09/09/2015


Correlates of War: National Material Capabilities (v4.0)
Data providerCorrelates of War
SourceCorrelates of War
DescriptionIron and steel production, military expenditure, military personnel
Linkhttp://cow.dss.ucdavis.edu/data-sets/national-material-capabilities
Retrieved09/09/2015


Additional information

Deflated the pre-1914 series to give the value in 1900 UK £s and  deflated the post-1914 series to give the value in 2000 US $s.
